LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_Barley.label: mouse-ear barley
LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_Barley.description: A tall, moderately slow-growing and hardy cereal plant that yields small edible grains. This particular variety has round rather than elongated seeds, and is mainly cultivated by Mousekin societies as food, brewing feedstock and animal fodder.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_Wheat.label: wheat
LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_Wheat.description: A tall, slow-growing cereal plant that yields small oval amber-colored edible grains. As one of the earliest crops to be cultivated, it is regarded as a major food staple in many civilizations.
